anthropic_config.system: Generate a monthly revenue performance report showing MRR, number of active subscriptions, and churned subscriptions for the last 6 months, grouped by month.

usage_example.python:
from anthropic import Anthropic

client = Anthropic()

message = client.messages.create(
    model="claude-sonnet-4-20250514",
    max_tokens=4096,
    system="""Generate a monthly revenue performance report showing MRR, number of active subscriptions, and churn...""",
    messages=[
        {"role": "user", "content": "Your message here"}
    ]
)
print(message.content[0].text)
